pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sample Size Calculation for High Dimensional Classification Study // Determine the sample size requirement to achieve the target probability of correct classification (PCC) for studies employing high-dimensional features. The package implements functions to 1) determine the asymptotic feasibility of the classification problem; 2) compute the upper bounds of the PCC for any linear classifier; 3) estimate the PCC of three design methods given design assumptions; 4) determine the sample size requirement to achieve the target PCC for three design methods.
